name: ButlerRadioNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Offers local daily newscast from the Butler Radio Network in Butler, PA.

This skill provides the following feeds...

• Butler Radio News: Local Butler County news updated throughout the day (default feed)
• Butler Radio Sports: Local sports news updated twice a day (additional feed must be turned on in app)
• Butler Radio Weather: Local Butler County weather forecast(additional feed must be turned on in app)

After skill is enabled say things like "Alexa, what's in the news?" or Alexa, what's in my flash briefing?" to hear your content.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
